title: Fighting Amara (Part 4)
body:
Fighting Amara (Part 4)

Due to the illusion formation, Evan felt a strange energy trying to invade his mind, but because of his high spiritual power, the illusion was completely ineffective against him. He just created a mental barrier using his spiritual power and completely ignored the illusion formation.

But the other four formations were still effective against him.

Due to the effect of Strength, Agility, Mana and Stamina Dissipation Formations, he lost a great amount of his power. But these four formations were still inferior to the Absolute Sealing Formation.

'It's good that these formations are not affecting my Monarch Core' Evan sighed in relief when he saw only his prime core was affected by these formations.

Unlike the Absolute Sealing Formation which was able to affect both of his prime core and monarch core, these four formations were unable to reduce the power of his Monarch Core.
